Group Overview:  Headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, we operate construction and manufacturing businesses, design & development centers and a host of facilities in the Middle East and other countries.alfanar Building Systems   alfanar Construction is classified as a Grade I contractor by the Contractors Classification Committee of the Government of Saudi Arabia.  alfanar Building Systems manufactures and markets a variety of building construction products and systems. .The core manufacturing activities of the industries operating under alfanar Building Systems are:   • Façade cladding, glazing systems and architectural aluminum products   • Precast concrete products and architectural elements   • Real Estate Devopment We are seeking a skilled and experienced Quantity Surveyor to join our growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for managing the cost of construction projects, from pre-construction to completion. You will work closely with the commercial manager, architects, engineers, and subcontractors to develop and maintain project budgets, track progress, and identify and mitigate risks.Prepare and review bills of quantities (BOQs) and other cost estimates
Monitor contracts with subcontractors
Monitor and track project progress and costs
Prepare and present regular invoices, cost reports to the commercial manager and client
Ensure that all invoices are completed within budget and on scheduleJob Details
